result.title: how can i submit solution remotely?
result.content: hi, i want to submit my solutions remotely, like only entering 1 command from terminal, (with my username-password and source file and problem id etc.) is there any third-party program or any script like that? i searched but i couldn't find, i guess a bot vjudge1 do this job very well, but i want only script or third-party program.
